select SEQ_MENU.nextval from dual
INSERT INTO MENU(id, meal_date, meal_type, corner, time) VALUES (#{id}, TO_DATE(#{mealDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{mealType}, #{corner, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{time})

select SEQ_MENU_ITEM.nextval from dual
INSERT INTO MENU_ITEM(id, menu_id, menu_name) VALUES (#{id}, #{menuId}, #{menuName})
mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.MEAL_DATE, m.MEAL_TYPE, m.CORNER, m."TIME", mi.MENU_NAME FROM MENU m, MENU_ITEM mi WHERE m.ID = mi.MENU_ID AND TRUNC(MEAL_DATE) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)
SELECT m.id, m.MEAL_DATE, m.MEAL_TYPE, m.CORNER, m."TIME", mi.MENU_NAME FROM MENU m, MENU_ITEM mi WHERE m.ID = mi.MENU_ID AND MEAL_DATE >= TRUNC(sysdate, 'D') AND MEAL_DATE <= TRUNC(sysdate, 'D') + 5

SELECT m.ID, TO_CHAR(m.MEAL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MEAL_DATE, m.MEAL_TYPE, m.CORNER, m."TIME", mi.MENU_NAME, CASE WHEN m.time = '조식' THEN 1 WHEN m.time = '중식' THEN 2 ELSE 3 END AS time_order FROM MENU m LEFT JOIN MENU_ITEM mi ON m.ID = mi.MENU_ID WHERE m.MEAL_DATE = TO_DATE(#{date}) ORDER BY time_order, m.ID, mi.ID

SELECT m.ID, TO_CHAR(m.MEAL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MEAL_DATE, m.MEAL_TYPE, m.CORNER, m."TIME", mi.MENU_NAME FROM MENU m LEFT JOIN MENU_ITEM mi ON m.ID = mi.MENU_ID WHERE TRUNC(m.MEAL_DATE) = TRUNC(CURRENT_DATE) AND "TIME" = #{time} ORDER BY MEAL_TYPE, m.ID, mi.ID
